name: henry-port
description: A Portfolio Site for Henry Okafor by Nonso Chukwuogor
author: Chinonso Chukwuogor
bio: I’m a visually driven creatives with 3+ years of experience as a UIUX designer. With a strong graphics background, a keen eye for details in UI design, and a user-centric approach to digital product design, I have  contributed  in building several products across varying sectors ranging from e-commerce, fintech and health in Nigeria. I’m readily available to build cutting-edge human-centered digital products with you.
